donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Intensifying HIV prevention services through the prevention of mother to child transmission of HIV; Intensifying HIV prevention services through Voluntary Medical Male Circumcision (VMMC); Strengthening HIV HIV prevention services by increasing the percentage of people who know their HIV status; Expansion of cold chain capacities for safe blood storage and transportation and sustaining the expansion of outreach for donor recruitment and blood donation;Strengthening Gonorrhoea (GC) Susceptibility and STI Syndrome Validation Studies; Increase access to and improve quality of HIV care and treatment;  To strengthen the HMIS and M&E capacity of the MOH and MCDMCH at all levels to be able to inform how the national health programs have ensured linkages with key drivers and determinants of health; access, coverage and quality of services and equity issues.; Strengthening the Procurement and Supplies Chain Management capacity of the MoH to ensure compliance, standardization, efficacy and rational drug use; Strengthen the Public Financial Management operations of the Ministry of Health and Ministry of Community Development and Maternal and Child Health and enhance their capacity to effectively plan and execute financial resources and ensure appropriate and optimal use at all levels.; Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building of the MoH and MCDMCH for Grant Management and implementation of programs; and create a supportive environment for efficient management of the programme by MOH and UNDP

project_descr: Securing and sustaining equitable access to ART commodities and services
project_title: SSF HIV-Securing and sustaining equitable access to ART
